paper.title: Enterprise people and skill discovery using tolerant retrieval and visualization
paper.abstract: Understanding an enterprise's workforce and skill-set can be seen as the key to understanding an organization's capabilities. In today's large organizations it has become increasingly difficult to find people that have specific skills or expertise or to explore and understand the overall picture of an organization's portfolio of topic expertise. This article presents a case study of analyzing and visualizing such expertise with the goal of enabling human users to assess and quickly find people with a desired skill set. Our approach is based on techniques like n-grams, clustering, and visualization for improving the user search experience for people and skills.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究企业员工和技能发现，涉及的技术包括n-grams、聚类和可视化，目的是改善用户搜索体验。这些技术与衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理无直接关联。
